channel.title: [PI] 317 Client Error Loading
channel.description:
Hey guys, I uploaded a cache to UPPIT.com and got the link for it, and put it in the Cachedownloader.java and compiled, and now when I load the Client here's what I get. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/30dkp5j.jpg[/img]
Thanks you guys for your help, ~Disengage.

item.title: [PI] 317 Client Error Loading
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Well the obvious reason that your client isn’t working is because it’s not reading your cache files right. The best thing to do is to place the cache folder in your client’s folder and just setting the path to your new cache folder. Hope this helps.

Read full topic
